name: Studentron
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 39 Game Jam.

Game Info

Get through a typical school day without being discovered as an android.
Your inventor needs you to manage your assignments, power level, and normal human interaction through all the day's classes. Make it to lunch to retrieve those precious Tater Tots.

Team
  • Mashbit
Controls
  • Type what you want to say into the Console.
  • Type commands into the Console. You'll learn more commands as you play the game.
  • Press 'Alt' to swap between the Console and your Assignment.
